item.title: Report E-2025020275
item.description:
Report E-2025020275

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-04T15:15:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-10
  • City: FLINT
  • State: MI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: MARATHON PETROLEUM COMPANY LP
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Driver was unloading and the vent fitting on the underground storage tank started to leak. Upon further inspection, the vent fitting was broken and the load was immediately stopped. Speedway was notified that the vent fitting on the tank was broken.
